title: iPatch 3.7.1 [K'ed] & Fixed for El Capitan.dmg
description:
iPatch 3.7.1 [K'ed] & Patched for El Capitan
--------------------------------------------

** I apologize for the first error torrent, but it is the first time uploading on TB

I am not sure what happened with this utility. Domain name points to a different site and the last update was a long time ago.

Last supported OS was Leopard.

When launching in Yosemite or El Capitan you would receive the error iPatch quit unexpectedly.

EXC_BAD_ADDRESS exception

Patched the application to run under Yosemite and El Capitan Beta.

Tested the app by generating a number of patches and it seems to work correctly.

Trial limitations have been removed, credits to Kurt.

The only option that is currently disabled is the Do not display the Patch Description at launch. It displays the description automatically.

To disable that right click on the produced patch -> Show package contents -> Contents -> Resources -> English.lproj -> delete Description.rtfd

I am not sure if there is a reason this utility has been discontinued, but I like it since I can't find a similar utility with a GUI.

I absolutely dislike the original icon of the app, so I am providing two options for your. Two apps, original icon and modern (also update toolbox icons).

Please test and let me know if it works ok for you.

Thanks,
Archimedes64
